General.Name: Suzhou TFC Optical Communication Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou TFC Optical Communication Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and markets fiber optical network connective components. The company provides Zirconia ceramic sleeves and fiber stubs; CNC precision metal parts; receptacles; OSA ODM/ OEM products; isolators; lens array; fiber and cable assembly; injection moulding; optical fiber adaptors; coating products; AWG MUX/De-MUX products; FA/RM products; and BOX/TO packaging products. It offers high speed coaxial packaging; high speed box packaging; micro-optics solution; AWG, PSM/DR, PM-FAU solutions; plastic lens& FA solutions; and Passive solution for AOC. Suzhou TFC Optical Communication Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

3.Name: Mr. Kai Rong  Chen
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
